cab.content: HiGovern1313MR. C,(S)' Mf^/Frorii Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,3rd March 1920. (Received 5th.)"284.8. Malleson wires 29th February repeating Tehran:-"I have just been informed by the Oonsal-General that Bolshevik troops have invaded Khorasan in the district of (corrupt group). No further details are available."He considers this may be only a false alarm as he has received no information from his agents. He also wires same date : "It is pretended by Bolsheviks that the reinforcements which are constantly being sent to Kushk are the advance guard army which is to assist Amir of Afghanistan to conquer India, but the Afghans are beginning to believe that these reinforcements are in reality intended to hinder any Afghan attempt to occupy promised territory and to defend Khushk frontier."
